metadata.title: Patryk Niedbalski - Software Engineer
metadata.description: Full-stack software engineer specializing in modern web applications

hero.description: I help businesses build fast, reliable web applications that are user-friendly. From idea to launch, I'm here to help make it happen.

bio.paragraph1: I'm a developer who genuinely enjoys turning complex problems into simple, elegant solutions. For me, code isn't just about functionality - it's about creating experiences that feel natural and effortless.
bio.paragraph2: Throughout my career, I've worked in companies with different profiles - from startups and software houses to companies partnering with some of the worldâ€™s largest corporations, building everything from internal tools to customer-facing platforms. I thrive in collaborative environments where good ideas can come from anywhere.
bio.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me spending time with family, traveling, reading books, or playing football.

services.heading: What I can do for you
services.description: Whether you need a new application or want to improve an existing one, I've got you covered.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: I spent my first two years focusing exclusively on frontend, which helped me master its intricacies. I stay up to date with the latest trends and know how to build and deploy blazing-fast websites, configure SEO and Google Analytics setup. I use Atomic Design as my primary architecture!

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Solid foundations matter. I design and build APIs, databases, and server-side logic that scale with your business and keep your data secure. I work on backend systems daily, following best practices related to Domain-Driven Design.

automation.title: Automation & Tooling
automation.description: Repetitive tasks slow you down. I build custom tools and automated workflows that free up your team to focus on what really matters. Need a script to fill in data, prepare files, or send something automatically? Let me know, we'll figure something out together!

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Speed wins. I analyze bottlenecks and implement optimizations that make your applications lightning fast and keep users engaged. Load balancing, message queues, server-side rendering - there are many solutions for different problems.

projects.heading: Work I'm proud of
projects.description: A selection of projects where I helped clients achieve their goals.

parkiza.name: Parkiza
parkiza.summary: A complete parking reservation system that handles thousands of bookings. Built with a modern stack including NestJS and React, it streamlined operations for the entire organization.

signalos.name: SignalOS
signalos.summary: An integrated building management platform that brings multiple systems under one roof. This enterprise solution helps facility managers work smarter, not harder.

areoactive.name: Areoactive
areoactive.summary: A high-converting landing page designed to capture attention and drive results. Fast, responsive, and built to perform.

faq.heading: Questions? I've got answers
faq.description: Here's what people usually want to know before we start working together.

services.question: What kind of projects do you take on?
services.answer: I work on web applications of all sizes - from simple landing pages to admin systems, MVPs for startups to complex enterprise systems.

teams.question: Do you work with small teams or only big companies?
teams.answer: Both! I enjoy the fast pace of startups just as much as the structure of larger organizations. What matters most is that we're solving interesting problems together.

timeline.question: How long does a typical project take?
timeline.answer: It depends on scope, but most projects run between 4-12 weeks. I'll give you a realistic timeline after we discuss your needs in detail.

collaboration.question: Can you work with our existing team?
collaboration.answer: Of course. I'm naturally open-minded but also inquisitive. Several years of working at an event agency helped me polish my soft skills. I'm used to collaborating with designers, product managers, and other developers. I adapt to your tools and processes, not the other way around.

start.question: How do we get started?
start.answer: Just send me a message with a brief description of what you need. I'll get back to you to schedule a call and discuss the details.

contact.heading: Let's build something great
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Drop me a line and let's talk about how I can help.

status.success: Thanks! Your message has been sent.
status.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

footer.description: Software engineer crafting thoughtful digital experiences.
